about_the_game:
The glaciers have been melting and an old unknown viral strain has been released. The infection initially spread due to contaminated food and water sources. It doesn't make someone sick immediately, instead it takes time and festers in the host. The catalyst for the infection to take over is death. The host can continue life without ever knowing that they've been infected.

Government response has been to quarantine an area, to try and contain it. Any questions asked towards the government's have been met with disregard. Because of this, some survivors of these outbreaks have answered a call to respond to the outbreaks and help as many people as they can. This group sneaks into these zones to try and show the world the horrors that have unfolded.

Features

  • Inventory Management
  • Puzzles
  • Co-op actions
  • Simple Crafting
  • Character Selection
  • Trait System
  • Special Items
  • Boss fights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600 or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: An ancient viral strain has re-entered the world. People are coming back from the dead and no one knows why. Play as a group of survivors with your friends in this 4-player co-op action survival horror and uncover the mysterious events that have unfolded.
